summary: Military scientists discover an alternate dimension and, subsequently, aliens with an appetite for human flesh.
cast: Jan-Michael Vincent|Paul Koslo|Tara Buckman|Jano Frandsen|Nicholas Lea|W.F. Wadden|Rolf Reynolds|Nic Amoroso|Bob Wilde|Rachel Hayward|Tracy Westerholm|Gerry Nairn|Nicola Crosbie|Michael Metcalfe|Thom Schioler|Steve Wright|John McEwen|Harry Jaako
director: Director: Harry Bromley Davenport (as Harry Bromley-Davenport)
title: Xtro 2: El segundo encuentro
